name: Pulse Oximeter
specifications: Battery-operated device; plastic finger or ear clip sensor; LED digital display; lightweight (50–100 g).
function: Measures oxygen saturation (SpO2) and pulse rate non-invasively.
usage: Clean sensor; attach to patient’s finger or ear; ensure stable placement; wait for readings and monitor for accuracy.
maintenance: Disinfect sensor surface after each use; avoid dropping the device; check battery regularly.
warning: Using on cold or wet fingers, which can give inaccurate readings.
